activation.condition: Spend 1 Resolve Point from your communal pool

description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zITucvIlaUKx6hta]{Accord}

While you have at least 1 Resolve Point in your communal pool, you and your allies gain benefits from watching out for one another.

So long as at least half of you and your linked allies are not @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.Item.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-Footed}, then none of you become flat-footed when flanked.

So long as at least half of you and your linked allies can precisely perceive a creature, then none of you are flat-footed against that creature’s attacks, even if it is unseen.

As a move action, you can spend 1 Resolve Point from your communal pool to share one of the following abilities possessed by you or a linked ally within range with yourself and all linked allies within range for 1d4 rounds: @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.NW9pxsxvuGNnxfBA]{Blindsense}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.HhrIJeHTxSGVX9mV]{Darkvision}, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.ivfqMdylivscbLak]{Low-Light Vision}, or the effects of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.5aW793TGgd3Kd4Fe]{See Invisibility}. You can share a linked ally’s @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.Item.dc5eXeQHv3dej49a]{Blindsight} in this way, but the recipients instead gain blindsense with the same range and medium.
